resources.string:
Notice to users: Before using Shutdown Timer, please read the disclaimer carefully. You must agree to all terms below before you use the software. If you do not agree to all terms, do not use the software.

(1) You will take all responsibility for potential risks and accidental damage caused by using this root tool.
(2) Once the user set countdown finishes, the device will shutdown immediately no matter what. Unsaved data may get lost!
(3) Although thoroughly tested, I cannot guarantee that this app is completely compatible and error free on all Operating Systems and versions of Operating Systems, nor can I guarantee compatibility with all hardware. If your device won't shutdown you may try the other shutdown methods provided in the settings section of this app.

If there are compatibility problems or software errors, you can contact me and send feedback at info@jonathansautter.de.
Set time to add to running timer (default 10)
Give your smartphone a break, and sleep better without radiation from your device, or annoying interruptions!\n\nhttp://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=
Something went wrong. Please try again!

for helping me writing this app and for the english translation. Tap here to check out his apps on Google Play!
This will display a dialog 10 seconds before shutdown allowing you to extend or cancel the timer.\n\nPlease permit drawing over other apps in the following screen to enable this feature.

We noticed you previously activated this feature but we could not gain the permission to draw over other apps.\n\nPlease permit drawing over other apps in the following screen to enable this feature again.

This App works only on rooted devices! If you don\'t know what rooted means, you\'re most likely not rooted and this app won\'t work on your device, sorry.\nFor more information about rooting you can read more about it here: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rooting_(Android_OS)
An error occorred. Sending me the log would really help me to fix the problem. Thanks!
Hi, AutoOff just crashed. Please take a look!\n\n
Couldn\'t shutdown your device! Please check if root access granted. Also, installing busybox may help.
Shutdown device at specific time of day.
Shutdown device in set time in minutes.
Shutdown device after set time in minutes after the device turned on.
Show countdown dialog 10 seconds before shutdown.
Opening the app, extending or canceling the shutdown timer requires a pin.
Short vibration in set time before the device shuts down.
Play short sound in set time before the device shuts down.
Set time before shutdown to vibrate/play sound (default 1)
.\nDo you want to stop the timer now and set boot timer instead?
Timer already set to start on boot which possibly interferes with repeating time mode.\nDo you want to deactivate boot mode and start repeating time mode instead?
Found a bug? Please let me know!
Please consider rating this app if you find it useful.
Tell your friends about this awesome app.
